intro: Psychotria ilheosana, commonly known as the Ilheus Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant native to Brazil. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenia. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white flowers. It is typically found in humid, shaded environments within tropical forests. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
